entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 7:30 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: WNW 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or a few rain showers changing to periods of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4 except minus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 except minus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
